en-US.summary: Track your pill bottles with PillBuddy smart holder
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask pillbuddy what's my status
Alexa, tell pillbuddy to set up my bottles
en-US.name: PillBuddy
en-US.description: PillBuddy helps you track your pill bottles using a smart holder with three slots. Set up your prescriptions, check pill counts, and get refill reminders through voice commands.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This is a hackathon project for testing purposes. Requires PillBuddy ESP32 hardware device.
